We look forward to your participation! interest in, and support of, Nankai University's College of Economic and Social Development Alumni Association. We will give full play to the role of the alumni association as a link between alumni, promoting friendship, and promoting mutual assistance and common prosperity, and continue to provide high-quality and efficient services to all alumni of the college. We look forward to your participation!
